useCase.name: Configure AGVs in Warehouse
useCase.description: As a Warehouse Employee, I want to input information about AGVs available in the warehouse.

preconditions.precondition: The Warehouse Employee chooses to configure AGVs.

successEndConditions.condition: The AGVs are successfully configured with the provided information.

useCase.trigger: Warehouse Employee asks to configure the AGVs available in the warehouse.

mainSequence.step: Warehouse Employee asks to configure the AGVs available on the warehouse.
System requests data for AGV docks from the Warehouse Employee.
Warehouse Employee provides AGV dock related data to the System.
System requests detailed data (short description, model, maximum weight, maximum volume, base location, status, current task) for the AGVs from the Warehouse Employee.
Warehouse Employee provides detailed AGV data to the System.
System informs the Warehouse Employee about the successful completion of the operations.
